00057     public DiffResult(DatabaseSnapshot baseDatabase, DatabaseSnapshot targetDatabase) {
00058         this.baseDatabase = baseDatabase.getDatabase();
00059         this.targetDatabase = targetDatabase.getDatabase();
00060 
00061         this.baseSnapshot = baseDatabase;
00062         this.targetSnapshot = targetDatabase;
00063     }

00201     public void printResult(PrintStream out) throws JDBCException {
00202         out.println("Base Database: " + targetDatabase.getConnectionUsername() + " " + targetDatabase.getConnectionURL());
00203         out.println("Target Database: " + baseDatabase.getConnectionUsername() + " " + baseDatabase.getConnectionURL());
00204 
00205         printComparision("Product Name", productName, out);
00206         printComparision("Product Version", productVersion, out);
00207         printSetComparison("Missing Tables", getMissingTables(), out);
00208         printSetComparison("Unexpected Tables", getUnexpectedTables(), out);
00209         printSetComparison("Missing Views", getMissingViews(), out);
00210         printSetComparison("Unexpected Views", getUnexpectedViews(), out);
00211         printSetComparison("Missing Columns", getMissingColumns(), out);
00212         printSetComparison("Unexpected Columns", getUnexpectedColumns(), out);
00213         printColumnComparison(getChangedColumns(), out);
00214         printSetComparison("Missing Foreign Keys", getMissingForeignKeys(), out);
00215         printSetComparison("Unexpected Foreign Keys", getUnexpectedForeignKeys(), out);
00216         printSetComparison("Missing Primary Keys", getMissingPrimaryKeys(), out);
00217         printSetComparison("Unexpected Primary Keys", getUnexpectedPrimaryKeys(), out);
00218         printSetComparison("Missing Indexes", getMissingIndexes(), out);
00219         printSetComparison("Unexpected Indexes", getUnexpectedIndexes(), out);
00220         printSetComparison("Missing Sequences", getMissingSequences(), out);
00221         printSetComparison("Unexpected Sequences", getUnexpectedSequences(), out);
00222     }
00223 
00224     private void printSetComparison(String title, SortedSet<?> objects, PrintStream out) {
00225         out.print(title + ": ");
00226         if (objects.size() == 0) {
00227             out.println("NONE");
00228         } else {
00229             out.println();
00230             for (Object object : objects) {
00231                 out.println("     " + object);
00232             }
00233         }
00234     }
00235 
00236     private void printColumnComparison(SortedSet<Column> changedColumns, PrintStream out) {
00237         out.print("Changed Columns: ");
00238         if (changedColumns.size() == 0) {
00239             out.println("NONE");
00240         } else {
00241             out.println();
00242             for (Column column : changedColumns) {
00243                 out.println("     " + column);
00244                 Column baseColumn = baseSnapshot.getColumn(column);
00245                 if (baseColumn.isDataTypeDifferent(column)) {
00246                     out.println("           from " + baseColumn.getDataTypeString(baseDatabase) + " to " + targetSnapshot.getColumn(column).getDataTypeString(targetDatabase));
00247                 }
00248                 if (baseColumn.isNullabilityDifferent(column)) {
00249                     Boolean nowNullable = targetSnapshot.getColumn(column).isNullable();
00250                     if (nowNullable == null) {
00251                         nowNullable = Boolean.TRUE;
00252                     }
00253                     if (nowNullable) {
00254                         out.println("           now nullable");
00255                     } else {
00256                         out.println("           now not null");
00257                     }
00258                 }
00259             }
00260         }
00261     }
00262 
00263     private void printComparision(String title, DiffComparison comparison, PrintStream out) {
00264         out.print(title + ":");
00265         if (comparison.areTheSame()) {
00266             out.println(" EQUAL");
00267         } else {
00268             out.println();
00269             out.println("     Base:   '" + comparison.getBaseVersion() + "'");
00270             out.println("     Target: '" + comparison.getTargetVersion() + "'");
00271         }
00272 
00273     }
00274 
00275     public void printChangeLog(PrintStream out, Database targetDatabase) throws ParserConfigurationException, IOException {
00276         this.printChangeLog(out, targetDatabase, new DefaultXmlWriter());
00277     }
00281     public void printChangeLog(PrintStream out, Database targetDatabase, XmlWriter xmlWriter) throws ParserConfigurationException, IOException {
00282         DocumentBuilderFactory factory = DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance();
00283         DocumentBuilder documentBuilder = factory.newDocumentBuilder();
00284         documentBuilder.setEntityResolver(new LiquibaseSchemaResolver());
00285 
00286         Document doc = documentBuilder.newDocument();
00287 
00288         Element changeLogElement = doc.createElement("databaseChangeLog");
00289         changeLogElement.setAttribute("xmlns", "http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/"+ XMLChangeLogParser.getSchemaVersion());
00290         changeLogElement.setAttribute("xmlns:xsi", "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance");
00291         changeLogElement.setAttribute("xsi:schemaLocation", "http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/"+XMLChangeLogParser.getSchemaVersion()+" http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-"+XMLChangeLogParser.getSchemaVersion()+".xsd");
00292 
00293         doc.appendChild(changeLogElement);
00294 
00295         List<Change> changes = new ArrayList<Change>();
00296         addMissingTableChanges(changes, targetDatabase);
00297         addUnexpectedTableChanges(changes);
00298         addMissingColumnChanges(changes, targetDatabase);
00299         addUnexpectedColumnChanges(changes);
00300         addChangedColumnChanges(changes);
00301         addMissingPrimaryKeyChanges(changes);
00302         addUnexpectedPrimaryKeyChanges(changes);
00303         addMissingIndexChanges(changes);
00304         addUnexpectedIndexChanges(changes);
00305         addMissingForeignKeyChanges(changes);
00306         addUnexpectedForeignKeyChanges(changes);
00307         addMissingSequenceChanges(changes);
00308         addUnexpectedSequenceChanges(changes);
00309         addMissingViewChanges(changes);
00310         addUnexpectedViewChanges(changes);
00311 
00312         for (Change change : changes) {
00313             Element changeSet = doc.createElement("changeSet");
00314             changeSet.setAttribute("author", "diff-generated");
00315             changeSet.setAttribute("id", generateId());
00316 
00317             changeSet.appendChild(change.createNode(doc));
00318             doc.getDocumentElement().appendChild(changeSet);
00319         }
00320 
00321 
00322         xmlWriter.write(doc, out);
00323 
00324         out.flush();
00325     }
00326 
00327     private String generateId() {
00328         return baseId.toString() + "-" + changeNumber++;
00329     }
00330 
00331     private void addUnexpectedIndexChanges(List<Change> changes) {
00332         for (Index index : getUnexpectedIndexes()) {
00333 
00334             DropIndexChange change = new DropIndexChange();
00335             change.setTableName(index.getTable().getName());
00336             change.setIndexName(index.getName());
00337 
00338             changes.add(change);
00339         }
00340     }
00341 
00342     private void addMissingIndexChanges(List<Change> changes) {
00343         for (Index index : getMissingIndexes()) {
00344 
00345             CreateIndexChange change = new CreateIndexChange();
00346             change.setTableName(index.getTable().getName());
00347             change.setIndexName(index.getName());
00348 
00349             for (String columnName : index.getColumns()) {
00350                 ColumnConfig column = new ColumnConfig();
00351                 column.setName(columnName);
00352                 change.addColumn(column);
00353             }
00354             changes.add(change);
00355         }
00356     }
00357 
00358     private void addUnexpectedPrimaryKeyChanges(List<Change> changes) {
00359         for (PrimaryKey pk : getUnexpectedPrimaryKeys()) {
00360 
00361             DropPrimaryKeyChange change = new DropPrimaryKeyChange();
00362             change.setTableName(pk.getTable().getName());
00363             change.setConstraintName(pk.getName());
00364 
00365             changes.add(change);
00366         }
00367     }
00368 
00369     private void addMissingPrimaryKeyChanges(List<Change> changes) {
00370         for (PrimaryKey pk : getMissingPrimaryKeys()) {
00371 
00372             AddPrimaryKeyChange change = new AddPrimaryKeyChange();
00373             change.setTableName(pk.getTable().getName());
00374             change.setConstraintName(pk.getName());
00375             change.setColumnNames(pk.getColumnNames());
00376 
00377             changes.add(change);
00378         }
00379     }
00380 
00381     private void addUnexpectedForeignKeyChanges(List<Change> changes) {
00382         for (ForeignKey fk : getUnexpectedForeignKeys()) {
00383 
00384             DropForeignKeyConstraintChange change = new DropForeignKeyConstraintChange();
00385             change.setConstraintName(fk.getName());
00386             change.setBaseTableName(fk.getPrimaryKeyTable().getName());
00387 
00388             changes.add(change);
00389         }
00390     }
00391 
00392     private void addMissingForeignKeyChanges(List<Change> changes) {
00393         for (ForeignKey fk : getMissingForeignKeys()) {
00394 
00395             AddForeignKeyConstraintChange change = new AddForeignKeyConstraintChange();
00396             change.setConstraintName(fk.getName());
00397 
00398             change.setReferencedTableName(fk.getPrimaryKeyTable().getName());
00399             change.setReferencedColumnNames(fk.getPrimaryKeyColumns());
00400 
00401             change.setBaseTableName(fk.getForeignKeyTable().getName());
00402             change.setBaseColumnNames(fk.getForeignKeyColumns());
00403 
00404             change.setDeferrable(fk.isDeferrable());
00405             change.setInitiallyDeferred(fk.isInitiallyDeferred());
00406 
00407             changes.add(change);
00408         }
00409     }
00410 
00411     private void addUnexpectedSequenceChanges(List<Change> changes) {
00412         for (Sequence sequence : getUnexpectedSequences()) {
00413 
00414             DropSequenceChange change = new DropSequenceChange();
00415             change.setSequenceName(sequence.getName());
00416 
00417             changes.add(change);
00418         }
00419     }
00420 
00421     private void addMissingSequenceChanges(List<Change> changes) {
00422         for (Sequence sequence : getMissingSequences()) {
00423 
00424             CreateSequenceChange change = new CreateSequenceChange();
00425             change.setSequenceName(sequence.getName());
00426 
00427             changes.add(change);
00428         }
00429     }
00430 
00431     private void addUnexpectedColumnChanges(List<Change> changes) {
00432         for (Column column : getUnexpectedColumns()) {
00433             if (!shouldModifyColumn(column)) {
00434                 continue;
00435             }
00436 
00437             DropColumnChange change = new DropColumnChange();
00438             change.setTableName(column.getTable().getName());
00439             change.setColumnName(column.getName());
00440 
00441             changes.add(change);
00442         }
00443     }
00444 
00445     private void addMissingViewChanges(List<Change> changes) {
00446         for (View view : getMissingViews()) {
00447 
00448             CreateViewChange change = new CreateViewChange();
00449             change.setViewName(view.getName());
00450             String selectQuery = view.getDefinition();
00451             if (selectQuery == null) {
00452                 selectQuery = "COULD NOT DETERMINE VIEW QUERY";
00453             }
00454             change.setSelectQuery(selectQuery);
00455 
00456             changes.add(change);
00457         }
00458     }
00459 
00460     private void addChangedColumnChanges(List<Change> changes) {
00461         for (Column column : getChangedColumns()) {
00462             if (!shouldModifyColumn(column)) {
00463                 continue;
00464             }
00465 
00466             boolean foundDifference = false;
00467             Column baseColumn = baseSnapshot.getColumn(column);
00468             if (column.isDataTypeDifferent(baseColumn)) {
00469                 ColumnConfig columnConfig = new ColumnConfig();
00470                 columnConfig.setName(column.getName());
00471                 columnConfig.setType(baseColumn.getDataTypeString(targetDatabase));
00472 
00473                 ModifyColumnChange change = new ModifyColumnChange();
00474                 change.setTableName(column.getTable().getName());
00475                 change.addColumn(columnConfig);
00476 
00477                 changes.add(change);
00478                 foundDifference = true;
00479             }
00480             if (column.isNullabilityDifferent(baseColumn)) {
00481                 if (baseColumn.isNullable() == null || baseColumn.isNullable()) {
00482                     DropNotNullConstraintChange change = new DropNotNullConstraintChange();
00483                     change.setTableName(column.getTable().getName());
00484                     change.setColumnName(column.getName());
00485                     change.setColumnDataType(baseColumn.getDataTypeString(targetDatabase));
00486 
00487                     changes.add(change);
00488                     foundDifference = true;
00489                 } else {
00490                     AddNotNullConstraintChange change = new AddNotNullConstraintChange();
00491                     change.setTableName(column.getTable().getName());
00492                     change.setColumnName(column.getName());
00493                     change.setColumnDataType(baseColumn.getDataTypeString(targetDatabase));
00494                     
00495                     changes.add(change);
00496                     foundDifference = true;
00497                 }
00498 
00499             }
00500             if (!foundDifference) {
00501                 throw new RuntimeException("Unknown difference");
00502             }
00503         }
00504     }
00505 
00506     private boolean shouldModifyColumn(Column column) {
00507         return column.getView() == null
00508                 && !baseDatabase.isLiquibaseTable(column.getTable().getName());
00509 
00510     }
00511 
00512     private void addUnexpectedViewChanges(List<Change> changes) {
00513         for (View view : getUnexpectedViews()) {
00514 
00515             DropViewChange change = new DropViewChange();
00516             change.setViewName(view.getName());
00517 
00518             changes.add(change);
00519         }
00520     }
00521 
00522 
00523     private void addMissingColumnChanges(List<Change> changes, Database database) {
00524         for (Column column : getMissingColumns()) {
00525             if (!shouldModifyColumn(column)) {
00526                 continue;
00527             }
00528 
00529             AddColumnChange change = new AddColumnChange();
00530             change.setTableName(column.getTable().getName());
00531 
00532             ColumnConfig columnConfig = new ColumnConfig();
00533             columnConfig.setName(column.getName());
00534 
00535 
00536             String dataType = column.getDataTypeString(database);
00537 
00538             columnConfig.setType(dataType);
00539 
00540             columnConfig.setDefaultValue(database.convertJavaObjectToString(column.getDefaultValue()));
00541 
00542             change.addColumn(columnConfig);
00543 
00544             changes.add(change);
00545         }
00546     }
00547 
00548     private void addMissingTableChanges(List<Change> changes, Database database) {
00549         for (Table missingTable : getMissingTables()) {
00550             if (baseDatabase.isLiquibaseTable(missingTable.getName())) {
00551                 continue;
00552             }
00553 
00554             CreateTableChange change = new CreateTableChange();
00555             change.setTableName(missingTable.getName());
00556             if (missingTable.getRemarks() != null) {
00557                 change.setRemarks(missingTable.getRemarks());
00558             }
00559 
00560             for (Column column : missingTable.getColumns()) {
00561                 ColumnConfig columnConfig = new ColumnConfig();
00562                 columnConfig.setName(column.getName());
00563                 columnConfig.setType(column.getDataTypeString(database));
00564 
00565                 ConstraintsConfig constraintsConfig = null;
00566                 if (column.isPrimaryKey()) {
00567                     constraintsConfig = new ConstraintsConfig();
00568                     constraintsConfig.setPrimaryKey(true);
00569 
00570                     PrimaryKey pkToRemove = null;
00571                     for (PrimaryKey pk : getMissingPrimaryKeys()) {
00572                         if (pk.getTable().getName().equalsIgnoreCase(missingTable.getName())) {
00573                             pkToRemove = pk;
00574                         }
00575                     }
00576 
00577                     if (pkToRemove != null) {
00578                         getMissingPrimaryKeys().remove(pkToRemove);
00579                     }
00580                 }
00581 
00582                 if (column.isAutoIncrement()) {
00583                     columnConfig.setAutoIncrement(true);
00584                 }
00585 
00586                 if (column.isNullable() != null && !column.isNullable()) {
00587                     if (constraintsConfig == null) {
00588                         constraintsConfig = new ConstraintsConfig();
00589                     }
00590 
00591                     constraintsConfig.setNullable(false);
00592                 }
00593                 if (constraintsConfig != null) {
00594                     columnConfig.setConstraints(constraintsConfig);
00595                 }
00596 
00597                 Object defaultValue = column.getDefaultValue();
00598                 if (defaultValue == null) {
00599                     //do nothing
00600                 } else if (column.isAutoIncrement()) {
00601                     //do nothing
00602                 } else if (defaultValue instanceof Date) {
00603                     columnConfig.setDefaultValueDate((Date) defaultValue);
00604                 } else if (defaultValue instanceof Boolean) {
00605                     columnConfig.setDefaultValueBoolean(((Boolean) defaultValue));
00606                 } else if (defaultValue instanceof Number) {
00607                     columnConfig.setDefaultValueNumeric(((Number) defaultValue));
00608                 } else  {
00609                     columnConfig.setDefaultValue(defaultValue.toString());
00610                 }
00611 
00612                 change.addColumn(columnConfig);
00613             }
00614 
00615             changes.add(change);
00616         }
00617     }
00618 
00619     private void addUnexpectedTableChanges(List<Change> changes) {
00620         for (Table unexpectedTable : getUnexpectedTables()) {
00621             DropTableChange change = new DropTableChange();
00622             change.setTableName(unexpectedTable.getName());
00623 
00624             changes.add(change);
00625         }
00626     }
00627 
00628 }
